item.description:
From World Music Crash Arts Website:

Boston’s own Debo Band plays a hard-driving strain of ’70s Ethiopian pop music with elements of rock, funk and jazz. The 11-piece band created a huge buzz at globalFEST and SXSW this year for its “incredible energy and passion and excellence.”—All Songs Considered, NPR. Next Ambiance/Sub Pop released the band's hugely anticipated self-titled debut album on July 10.

Tickets are $15 and can be purchased here:

http://worldmusic.org/debo-band-0-953

We will meetup before for drinks/eats nearby at the Sunset Grill, 130 Brighton Ave at 7:30pm
item.name: Debo Band
